item.title: Trump Reaffirms ‘Strong’ Support For Pete Hegseth’s Defense Secretary Nomination
item.description: 'Pete is a WINNER, and there is nothing that can be done to change that!!!' wrote President-elect Donald Trump.

item.title: Canada’s ‘Doctor Death’ Has Killed Hundreds Of Patients And Counting
item.description: One doctor has murdered more than 430 patients — not counting unborn babies. She is still practicing this twisted 'medicine.'

item.title: Gail Slater Is The Perfect Pick To Lead The Trump DOJ’s Fight Against Big Tech
item.description: Everyone across the political spectrum — except, of course, tech giants and their paid shills in D.C. — should welcome the nomination of Gail Slater.

item.title: Venezuelan Busted For Extorting Illegals In PA Exposes Evil Side Effect Of Biden’s Open Borders
item.description: One immigration expert referred to it as 'new age slavery' that traps people in a spiral of debt.
